ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ( ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c,'Completed/Closed') || ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Status__c,'Submitted to Contracts') ) && ( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ) ) && ( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Sales Proposal") ) && ( Pricing_Manager__c <> Pricing_Analyst__c ) && ( (ISBLANK(Kickoff_Meeting_Date__c)) || (ISBLANK(Pricing_Commit_Date__c)) || (ISPICKVAL(Proposal_Years__c, '')) || (ISBLANK(Date_Pricing_Activity_Completed__c)) || (ISBLANK(Documentum_Link_Proposal__c)) ) && ( NOT(ISCHANGED( Last_Opened_Case__c ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter date for the "Proposal & Pricing Completion Date, Kickoff Meeting Date, Pricing Commit Date, and Proposal Years" and Documentum Link if the proposal Status is "Completed/Closed" or "Submitted to Contract".
